channel.title: (HELP) I couldn't install opencv for ubuntu 16.04
channel.description:
Hey guys i had a problem so i need your help.I want to install opencv for ubuntu 16.04 , i read lots of tutorial and i tried a lots of method but i failed all time.Is there any tutorial you know is working for ubuntu 16.04.
(English is my second language sorry for bad english)
